scripts.assert-beautified: beautify-proj -i test -c beautify.json -e bundle.js && beautify-proj -i scripts -c beautify.json
scripts.beautify: beautify-proj -i test -o . -c beautify.json -e bundle.js && beautify-proj -i scripts -o . -c beautify.json
scripts.node-full-test: npm run jshint && npm run node-test --coverage && istanbul check-coverage --lines 100 --function 100 --statements 100 --branches 100
scripts.browser-test-firefox: npm run jshint && CLIENT=selenium:firefox npm run browser-test
scripts.browser-test-chrome: npm run jshint && CLIENT=selenium:chrome npm run browser-test
scripts.browser-test-phantomjs: npm run jshint && CLIENT=selenium:phantomjs npm run browser-test
scripts.browser-coverage-full-test: npm run jshint && npm run browser-coverage-build && npm run browser-coverage-test && npm run browser-coverage-report && npm run browser-coverage-check
scripts.test: npm run assert-beautified && npm run node-full-test && npm run browser-coverage-full-test
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -s DeltaDB -o dist/deltadb.js && npm run min
